overview: Monique is so anxious to become a movie star that she gets naked for a producer, watches other naked girls in the producer’s other naked movies, and finally ends up starring in a naked skinflick where she’s tied up by a fetish freak. All of which is dutifully chronicled by her obsessed roommate Rita.
tagline: SHE'S EXCITING... SHE'S WILD... SHE'S OBSESSED WITH THE DESIRE FOR UNUSUAL THRILLS
title: Monique, My Love
